text: Hi guys, Im trying to use the API for analytics report and I got this error. "Only HubSpot Enterprise customers may use a HAPIkey to access this resource."

Hey <@UGXQK1B7Y> sorry for dropping off from our DM. You should switch to using OAuth. this means youâ€™ll have the `access_token` in the Authorization header. You can get that token following the information here <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/oauth2/oauth2-overview>.  Make sure *not* to also include the HAPIKey in the request
Thanks for info, Im trying to use it in analytics api.
